ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
2 (20 ounce) cans pineapple chunks, juice reserved
½ pound bacon slices, cut into 2 inch pieces
½ pound fresh mushrooms, stems removed

cookingTips: Soak wooden skewers for 30 minutes before grilling to prevent burning
Thread ingredients alternately for even cooking and visual appeal
Reserve pineapple juice to brush on skewers mid-cooking for extra flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through assembling and grilling beautiful Hawaiian skewers, balancing protein, vegetables, and fruit while developing caramelized flavors.
